div.p: If you've finished the other exercises and still have time left, please use this time to explore a few (related) concepts in greater depth. You should use the code window to experiment, but don't move on to the next section; just keep working on these topics until the end of class.
Modify the text in the code window. Play around with each idea until you're sure you understand it.
Don't forget. You can always click the Reset Code button to restore the default code in the code window (or click the Undo button to restore your most recently edited version of it).
